rules_text:
Equipped creature has first strike and reach.
[i]Crest of Flames[/i] – Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, put four +1/+1 counters on them.
Equip Byleth {0}
{3}, Discard Sword of The Creator: Search your library for a card named Byleth, reveal it, shuffle then put that card on top.
